title: Cybersecurity needs a rethink in the age of agentic AI
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence (AI) has entered a new phase. It is shifting from passive tools to autonomous agents that can plan and act across digital and physical systems, often for extended periods and in concert with other agents. Their interacting and collaborating capabilities are scaling quickly, allowing them to perform increasingly complex tasks with minimal human input across sectors such as banking, e-commerce, and logistics.

title: AI collaboration pushes fight against financial fraud in PH
description: FINTECH company Trusting Social marked its seventh year in the Philippines with a renewed call for cross-industry collaboration against financial fraud and cybercrime. The artificial intelligence–driven credit scoring and digital identity firm gathered banking, fintech, and regulatory leaders in Manila for its anniversary event, “7 Years Forward: Powering Financial Inclusion with AI.”

title: Career education options in AI after class 12: Here are 1-year, 3-year, 4-year and 5-year options
description: Artificial Intelligence is shaping every modern industry, and students completing class 12 can now enter this fast-growing field through various study options. From one-year diplomas to full-fledged degree programs, AI education offers pathways that combine coding, data analysis, and problem-solving skills to prepare learners for future-ready careers.

title: Microsoft To Use LinkedIn Data For AI Training By Default, Here's How To Opt Out
description: Microsoft-owned LinkedIn will start collecting user data to train its artificial intelligence (AI) models from Nov. 3, 2025. The professional networking giant announced updates to its terms of service, revealing plans to use member data, including profile details and public posts, to enhance AI-powered features on the platform.

title: China's Xi Uses APEC to Challenge US on AI, Trade
description: At a meeting of APEC leaders Saturday, Chinese President Xi Jinping took center stage to push a proposal for a global body to govern artificial intelligence and position China as an alternative to the United States on trade cooperation.

title: Reduce screen time, invest more time in reading: Yogi to youths
description: Inaugurating the ‘Gorakhpur Book Festival 2025’ at Deen Dayal Upadhyay Gorakhpur University, Yogi called upon students to reduce their screen time and invest more time in reading. He encouraged the youth to explore books on spirituality, science, environment, and artificial intelligence for holistic development.
